trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Anoka
There were no other sightings in Anoka on or around December 26th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI'm seeing another one. I returned home from a Christmas party with friends around 10:00Pm and was doing some work on my computer. I hadn't been drinking. My living room window is directly behind me facing due east. Around 1:30 AM I started to shutdown to go to bed when I glanced out the window and noticed a flickering light in the sky (same as I've reported in the last several days with the exception of blue lights). It seems to be hovering above the Ham Lake-Andover, MN area. It seems to be lower tonight than on previous nights. There are light wispy clouds in the background of the object. So I'm assuming this one isn't in orbit as I supposed the others were. I have been watching it now since 1:37 Am and it is now 2:11 AM. It has given no indication of moving from its position. I wish it would come closer so that I could get a good clear picture of it. I should report that two days ago I did observe the same star like object in orbit, but there were two of the one preceding Orion and one following Orion in orbit.
Summary: Larger than Star sized, Flashing lights of Red, Green, Yellow, white in the middle.
